item.description:
We had to postpone the Derry Dog Park from September due to inclement weather. Let's hope the weather is better on October 4th. The Meetup will be held in Derry if it's sunny, overcast or drizzling. Rain will cancel. I won't be able to make it this month, but I WILL post on this website at around 10:45 am if the Meetup has been cancelled.

-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel October Meetup
